ClientScoringVariables.Name: username

ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: Name of the group to check if the user is part of.

ServerScoringVariables.Name: userShouldBeInGroup

ConfiguredScoringItems.ScoringReportName: User teresa can not login without a password
ConfiguredScoringItems.DescriptiveName: User teresa can not login without a password

ClientScoringVariables.Name: username
ClientScoringVariables.HelpText: Name of the user to check.

ServerScoringVariables.Name: shouldBeAdministrator
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: Score if the user is or is not an administrator.

ConfiguredScoringItems.Name: Default Minimum Password Age

ServerScoringVariables.Name: minimumAcceptableValue
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: The lowest value permitted to pass the check.

ServerScoringVariables.Name: maximumAcceptableValue
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: The highest value permitted to pass the check.

ServerScoringVariables.Name: allowNotDefined
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: Whether or not having no custom minimum password age passes the check. Enable this if the default system value is acceptable to pass the check.

ConfiguredScoringItems.ScoringReportName: A sufficient default minimum password age is set
ConfiguredScoringItems.DescriptiveName: A sufficient default minimum password age is set

ServerScoringVariables.Name: shouldBeRemembered
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: Score if passwords are or are not remembered.

ServerScoringVariables.Name: fileMissingIsOk
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: Whether or not the check should pass if the common-password file is not found. Enable this if the system default is acceptable.

ClientScoringVariables.Name: packageName
ClientScoringVariables.HelpText: Name of the package to check.

ClientScoringVariables.Name: oldVersion
ClientScoringVariables.HelpText: The version of the package that will be initially installed on the system.

ClientScoringVariables.Name: requireNoUpdatesAvailable
ClientScoringVariables.HelpText: With this enabled, the check will only pass if the package version is different and if apt reports there are no newer versions to install. Otherwise, only the former is checked.

ServerScoringVariables.Name: packageShouldBeUpdated
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: Score if the package is or is not updated.

ConfiguredScoringItems.Name: Files in Directory Exists

ClientScoringVariables.Name: directory
ClientScoringVariables.HelpText: Path to the directory with files to check for.

ClientScoringVariables.Name: extension
ClientScoringVariables.HelpText: Only count files with this extension. Leave blank to ignore file extension. Case insensitive.

ServerScoringVariables.Name: directoryRemovedIsAcceptable
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: Whether or not the check passes if the directory doesn't exist.

ServerScoringVariables.Name: minCountToScore
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: The minimum number of files found to pass the check. Set to 0 if you want all files to be removed.

ServerScoringVariables.Name: maxCountToScore
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: The maximum number of files found to pass the check. Set to 0 if you want all files to be removed.

ConfiguredScoringItems.DescriptiveName: Prohibited MP3 files have been removed

ServerScoringVariables.Name: maxCountToScore
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: The maximum number of files found to pass the check. Set to 0 if you want all files to be removed.

ClientScoringVariables.HelpText: The key for the sysctl setting to check. Example: kernel.randomize_va_space.

ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: The value the setting should be to pass the check.

ServerScoringVariables.Name: shouldMatch
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: Score if the sysctl value does or does not match.

ConfiguredScoringItems.Name: File Permissions Match

ClientScoringVariables.Name: path
ClientScoringVariables.HelpText: Path to the file to check permissions of.

ServerScoringVariables.Name: fileNotFoundAcceptable
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: Whether or not the check passes if the file doesn't exist.

ServerScoringVariables.Name: octalBitmask
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: Three digit octal bitmask to bitwise AND with the files permissions before checking. Use this to ignore certain permissions.

ServerScoringVariables.Name: checkBits
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: Three digit octal permissions to check.

ServerScoringVariables.Name: scoreIfMatch
ServerScoringVariables.HelpText: Whether to score if the file permissions match or do not match the permission check.
